sys_hub_flow.description: Queues a computer object for a push to Armis. If no device is known, leave as 0. (In theory you can always leave as 0 but may as well send the device ID if there is one.)
sys_hub_flow.name: (OLD) QUEUE_ExplodeBackgroundUpdate
